item.title: Students
item.description: I am on leave during the Spring 2024 semester. I may be slow to respond to my university email. Office Hours Link to heading My office hours this semester are by appointment only. I’m on London time, so appointments will be somewhat early for East Coasters. Email me to make an appointment. Recommendation Letter Policy Link to heading I am happy to write letters of recommendation for students who meet the following criteria:
